column2: Ensuring project directory is given priority prior to settings import

column3: I'm developing a reusable Django app which has settings in example_project.settings. The example_project provides a project which is both a bare-bones example, and a bootstrap for the tests.

However ¨C and perhaps unsurprisingly ¨C another Django app also contained an example_project. Moreover, my project directories entry on sys.path only appears towards the end of the list, after many dependencies. In my case, the result was that the incorrect settings file would be imported.
I don't think this change should have any negative consequences, but I'm very much open for input.
PS. I couldn't see an email address to send the CLA to

For the CLA, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign (mention you github account name there), scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com
